name: Wario in Generic RPG Chapter 1 Full release!
name_original: Wario in Generic RPG Chapter 1 Full release!
description:
Wario wakes up one morning, to a voice in his head telling him to save the world!

After learning the mayor was kidnapped, Wario ventures out of his town,

and into adventure! Now, he is going to have to discover ancient secrets, battle dangerous and violent monsters, and defeat the mighty Gerald the Angy! Will you become the hero the kingdom needs?  

The story evolves along with the game, so stay tuned for updates!

  Join the Discord server! https://discord.gg/AHYJVSNh
